resources.string: FadCam is part of the FadSec Lab suite. For more information, click on \'view source code\' below.

FadCam is an ad-free, open-source video recording app that prioritizes privacy by not tracking or collecting any data. It is available exclusively on GitHub and through the official links mentioned in the README.

FadCam has been featured in popular YouTube channels like HowToMen and Xtream Droid, as well as discussed in GrapheneOS and eight other notable spots.
Join community for help, sharing ideas, and future app updates
